wbq-violations-explanations-general: Used as text of an infobox on [[Special:ViolationsPage]]
wbq-violations-explanations-exceptions: Explanation text about exceptions for violations special page.
wbq-violatons-filter-headline: Used as headline of a legend on [[Special:ViolationsPage]]
wbq-violations-entity-id-label: Label of the input control that contains the entity id.
wbq-violations-entity-id-placeholder: Placeholder  of the input control that contains the entity id.
wbq-violations-property-id-label: Label of the input control that contains the property id.
wbq-violations-property-id-placeholder: Placeholder of the input control that contains the property id.
wbq-violations-group-label: Label of the input control for selecting a group.
wbq-violations-type-label:
Label of the input control for selecting a type.
{{Identical|Type}}
wbq-violations-form-select-all: Label for select controls that is shown, when nothing is selected.
wbq-violations-exceptions-checkbox-label: Label of the checkbox that determines, whether exceptions should be shown or not.
wbq-violations-submit-button-label: Label of the button that applies the filter.
wbq-violations-invalid-entity-id: Message that is shown if entered entity id is invalid.
wbq-violations-not-existent-entity: Message that is shown if no entity exists for entered id.
wbq-violations-invalid-property-id: Message that is shown if entered property id is invalid.
wbq-violations-not-existent-property: Message that is shown if no property exists for entered id.
wbq-violations-table-header-entity: Header of the column that shows the entity.
wbq-violations-table-header-claim:
Header of the column that shows the violated claim.
{{Identical|Claim}}
wbq-violations-table-header-constraint-t:
Header of the column that shows the constraint type.
{{Identical|Type}}
wbq-violations-table-header-updated-at: Header of the column that shows the time the violation was updated.
wbq-violations-table-header-status:
Header of the column that shows the status of the violation.
{{Identical|Status}}
wbq-violations-table-header-additional-i: Header of the column that shows additional information of the violation depending on type
wbq-violations-status-unverified: Status for violations that might be obsolete because the check is outstanding.
wbq-violations-status-exception: Status for violations that are marked as exception.
wbq-violations-mark-as-exception: Message that is shown for marking a violation as exception on violation special page.
wbq-violations-mark-as-violation: Message that is shown for marking a excepted violation as violation on violation special page.
wbq-violations-next-page:
Message that is shown as link to next page.

The arrows should point forward, so they should be in reverse for right-to-left languages.
wbq-violations-prev-page:
Message that is shown as link to previous page.

The arrows should point backward, so they should be in reverse for right-to-left languages.
